news.title: Family of farmer Joe Grogan, who died one day after marriage, freeze multi-million-euro estate as 300,000 arrive for Ploughing
news.summary: The family of the late Joe Grogan have placed a legal freeze on the administration of his multi-­million-euro estate as a bitter dispute with his widow rages on.

news.title: Rise in the numbers with no arrangements in place for retirement
news.summary: There has been a rise in the number of adults who have no financial arrangements in place for their retirement.

news.title: Partner of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect is speaking to police, but accused Tyler Robinson is ‘not co-operating’
news.summary: The man arrested over the killing of right-wing activist Charlie Kirk is not co-operating with authorities, but investigators are working to establish a motive for the shooting by talking to his friends and family, Utah governor Spencer Cox said yesterday.

news.title: Fionnán Sheahan: Jack of all trades – Busy Chambers prioritises parish-pump tour and a Jim Gavin win over the Budget
news.summary: Jack Chambers stood in the community garden and sunroom in the village of Kilmeedy in west Limerick taking in the vista. The minister was on a tour of the south-west for the day last Wednesday.

news.title: Eamonn Sweeney: Harry Maguire and Luke Shaw sum up the many shortcomings of Ruben Amorim’s damned United
news.summary: The great symbols of Manchester United’s descent into mediocrity are not Marcus Rashford, Antony and Jadon Sancho but Luke Shaw and Harry Maguire.

news.title: Amy Donohoe: From Charlie Kirk division to ICE paranoia – what it’s like for Irish people living in Donald Trump’s America
news.summary: Moving to the US this year was always going to come with its hazards.

news.title: Emmy Awards: No luck for Irish nominees as Adolescence’s Owen Cooper becomes youngest ever male winner
news.summary: There was no luck for Ireland’s nominees at last night’s 77th Emmy Awards as British drama Adolescence, which dominated Netflix’s most-watched list earlier this year, swept the trophy table.

news.title: Ask Allison: My wife has developed facial hair in recent years and it is a turn-off. How do I broach this?
news.summary: Over the last 10 years or so, my wife has developed facial hair. She goes for electrolysis and a facial about every three weeks. As far as I can see there is no improvement at all.

news.title: I thought my back pain and tiredness was menopause – it was ovarian cancer
news.summary: Everybody experiences back pain at some point or other, so when Maggie Noone felt a twinge in her back and her right side while out walking with a friend on holiday in March 2023, she put it down to her Birkenstock sandals being an unsuitable choice of footwear.

news.title: Ciara Kelly: If you think Graham Linehan should be thrown in the clink but Kneecap are heroic, you’re only supporting free speech for those you agree with
news.summary: Lucy Connolly was jailed in the UK for racist posts online last year in the wake of the Southport attacks in which three small girls were killed. She’d previously lost a child herself and posted: “Mass deportation now. Set fire to the hotels (housing asylum seekers) for all I care.”
